samplesheet.title: Samplesheet
samplesheet.description: File containing the sample information and indexes

flowcell_id.title: Flow Cell ID
flowcell_id.description: If not provided, uses dataset name

lane.title: Lane
lane.description: Optional lane number. When a lane number is provided, only the given lane will be demultiplexed

workflow_version.title: Workflow Version
workflow_version.description: Select the specific version of nf-core/demux to use

skip_tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to skip (fastp,fastqc,kraken,multiqc,checkqc,falco,md5sum,samshee)
skip_tools.title: Skip Tools

sample_size.description: Number of reads to subsample for contamination detection.
sample_size.title: Sample Size

v1_schema.description: Is this using the Illumina V1 sample sheet?
v1_schema.title: Illumina V1 Schema
